scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains correspondence from or to: Elizabeth Nowell, the original agent for Mountain Path; Galina Hopkins, the second and final agent for Mountain Path; Russell and Volkening, Inc. the agents for The Dollmaker; Edith Jackson, agent for much of the screen and dramatic rights for Arnow's works, including Mountain Path, Hunter's Horn, and The Dollmaker; and miscellaneous agents.
